ghostPost.title: v2.3.2
ghostPost.html:
Hello everyone,

This release addresses the following bugs.

  • fix for the invalid contact resolved conversation activity messages
  • fix for file copy-paste issue
  • fix for the pre-chat form being rendered for identified contacts
  • fix for auto-scroll not working in the dashboard
  • sentry error fixes and improvements
ghostPost.excerpt:
Hello everyone, 

This release addresses the following bugs. 

 * fix for the invalid contact resolved conversation activity messages
 * fix for file copy-paste issue
 * fix for the pre-chat form being rendered for identified contacts
 * fix for auto-scroll not working in the dashboard
 * sentry error fixes and improvements
